image.alt: Mountain landscape image with a hand-drawn overlay that says "Altra Running 10th Anniversary".

text.text:
Congratulations on completing the Altra 10 Challenge! If you are a U.S. customer, your code will also be emailed to you shortly. If you're from outside the U.S. please use the links below to get your 10% off discount.

Thanks again for helping us celebrate our 10th Anniversary!

 

Terms & Conditions

image.alt: The Lone Peak, born a legend, now legendary.
